description:
Pare back to the essentials and you're free to jet up long routes and cover real distance in a day. These are strippable packs that can be whittled down for alpine routes (weighs 490g when fully stripped down). The Trad Zero 24 has enough room for clothing layers, food, water, shoes and gear for alpine routes and ridge scrambling.

  • Made of burly 420-denier Cordura® nylon with a polyurethane coating
  • Large main compartment with drawstring closure
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Removable foam back panel and hip belt
  • Lockable pocket for valuables has a key clip
  • Gear loops provides lashing options
  • Lots of external carry options, including rope, helmet and dual ice tool attachments
  • Hydration system compatible (sold separately)
name: Ortovox Trad Zero 24 Daypack - Unisex
